tagline: Your Gateway to Smarter, Ethical, and Data-Driven Investing.
product_overview: Tradelance is an educational fintech platform designed to simplify financial learning and stock market analysis. It focuses on Sharia-compliant stock analysis, market insights, research tools, tutorials, alerts, and responsible financial literacy. It does not provide direct buying or selling advice.
mission: To empower individuals with accessible financial education, responsible insights, and ethical investing tools while adhering to SEBI guidelines and promoting transparent learning.
features: Sharia-Compliant Stock Analysis
MMI Mood Index – Real-time Market Sentiment
Market Pressure Insights – Buying & Selling Trends
Comprehensive Stock Research – Swing, Mid, and Long-term
Stock Market Tutorials & Alerts
Track & Review Your Analysis – Save Strategies
Reward System – Earn as You Learn (Phase 2)
Referral Program – Invite & Benefit
Dedicated IPO Section & Real-Time IPO Tracker
Financial News Hub – Real-Time Market Updates
Top Stock Insights – Where Users Are Investing
Redesigned UI/UX – Smoother, More Intuitive Experience
Market Sentiment Analysis – Smarter Decisions
Daily NSE/BSE Stock Lists – Auto-Updated
Real-Time Notifications for Features, News & Updates
Stock Snapshot – Shareholding, Events & Insights
Historical Stock Data – Past Performance Analysis
Top Movers – Daily Gainers, Losers, 52-Week High/Low
Smart Calculators – SIP, EMI, Tax, Salary
Advanced Security – Upgraded Protection for Data & Access
Available on Both Android & iOS

faq_list.question: What is Tradelance?
faq_list.answer: Tradelance is an educational fintech platform offering stock market insights, Sharia-compliant analysis, research tools, tutorials, sentiment indices, and learning features to help users make informed decisions. It does not provide direct trading advice.

faq_list.question: Who is Tradelance for?
faq_list.answer: Tradelance is for beginners and experienced investors who want data-driven insights, ethical investing options, and educational tools for improving their market knowledge.

faq_list.question: Do you offer Sharia-compliant stock analysis?
faq_list.answer: Yes. Tradelance offers dedicated Sharia-compliant stock analysis for ethical investing.

faq_list.question: Do you provide buy or sell recommendations?
faq_list.answer: No. Tradelance focuses only on education and analysis and does not provide direct buy or sell recommendations. It adheres to SEBI guidelines.

faq_list.question: Do you have an IPO tracker?
faq_list.answer: Yes. Tradelance includes a dedicated IPO section with real-time tracking of ongoing and upcoming IPOs.

faq_list.question: Does Tradelance show market sentiment?
faq_list.answer: Yes. Features like MMI Mood Index and Market Pressure Insights provide real-time sentiment and trend analysis.

faq_list.question: Does Tradelance support Indian stock markets?
faq_list.answer: Yes. Tradelance provides NSE/BSE stock lists, insights, movers, and research tools for Indian markets.

faq_list.question: Are there tutorials available?
faq_list.answer: Yes. Tradelance offers comprehensive stock market tutorials, alerts, and educational content to help users learn strategies.

faq_list.question: Is there a reward system?
faq_list.answer: Yes. A reward system that allows users to earn as they learn is part of the upcoming Phase 2 update.

faq_list.question: Is there a referral program?
faq_list.answer: Yes. A referral program will allow users to invite others and benefit together.

faq_list.question: Do you provide market news?
faq_list.answer: Yes. Tradelance has a Financial News Hub that provides curated, real-time market news and important updates.

faq_list.question: Is the app available on iOS?
faq_list.answer: Yes. Tradelance will be available on both Android and iOS platforms.

faq_list.question: Do you have pricing details?
faq_list.answer: Pricing details are not listed in the provided SerenitySync materials. Please share your email so our team can follow up.
